# Python specific ignores
venv/                 # Ignores the virtual environment folder
*.pyc                 # Ignores compiled Python files
__pycache__/          # Ignores Python's cache directories
.Python               # A common virtual env name sometimes

# IDE specific ignores (if you're using VS Code)
.vscode/              # Ignore VS Code settings (optional, sometimes you want to share these)

# Generated files
menu_output.pdf       # Ignore generated PDF files
menu_output.png       # Ignore generated PNG files

# Operating System specific ignores
.DS_Store             # macOS specific files
Thumbs.db             # Windows specific files
